ksef.description: KSeF API Configuration. Environment: 'test', 'demo', or 'prod'. Get token from KSeF portal.

pushover.description: Pushover notification settings. Get credentials from https://pushover.net/

monitoring.description: Monitoring settings. check_interval in seconds. subject_types: Subject1 (sprzedażowe), Subject2 (zakupowe). date_type: Issue (data wystawienia) | Invoicing (data przyjęcia w KSeF) | PermanentStorage (data trwałego zapisu) — default: Invoicing. message_priority: -2 (cisza) | -1 (cicho) | 0 (normalne, default) | 1 (wysoka) | 2 (pilne, wymaga potwierdzenia). test_notification: send test on startup.
